examples.example: 我坐在教室的右边，认真地听老师讲课。

translate.english: I sit on the right side of the classroom and listen to the teacher carefully.

examples.example: 我走在路上，看到一位老人在我右边缓缓前行，我连忙过去搀扶他。

translate.english: I was walking on the road and saw an old man walking slowly on my right. I hurried to go and support him.

examples.example: 我走在街道右边，沐浴着温暖的阳光，心情格外舒畅。

translate.english: I walk on the right side of the street, bathing in the warm sunshine, and feeling extremely comfortable.
